document.full_text: south sudan's army fought militia in two oil-producing states on thursday, underscoring the challenges ahead as southern leaders agreed to resume talks with the government in khartoum.
document.title: south sudan army clash with heavily armed militia
lines_and_colors: south sudan's army fought militia in two oil-producing states on thursday, underscoring the challenges ahead as southern leaders agreed to resume talks with the government in khartoum.
